tasks.label: e2e:export-pdf
tasks.command: python -c "from pathlib import Path; from sidecar.planner import plan_from_prompt; from sidecar.writer_skip import apply_plan; from sidecar.tasks import export_pdf; from skip.eeschema import schematic as sch; p = Path('${input:sch}'); doc = sch.Schematic.from_file(str(p)); plan = plan_from_prompt('Add test component'); doc = apply_plan(doc, plan); doc.to_file(str(p)); export_pdf(p); print(f'PDF exported to {p.with_suffix(\".pdf\")}')"
